types.html:
au détour de

  1. during, in the course of
    Synonym: pendant
    au détour d'une conversation ― in the course of a conversation

Usage notes

[edit]

Carries a connotation of surprise: someone discovers or learns something unexpected while doing something else, despite not looking for it.

title: au détour de
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /o de.tuʁ də/
